meanings.definition: In a way that deserves praise or reward.
meanings.sent1: She worked meritoriously on her school project, earning top marks.
meanings.sent2: The student completed the assignment meritoriously, impressing the teacher.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed meritoriously after catching a toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone meritoriously through the clouds, brightening the day.
meanings.sent5: His efforts to help the community were meritoriously recognized by the mayor.

meanings.sent1: The meritorious student received a scholarship for her hard work.
meanings.sent2: His meritorious actions during the crisis saved many lives.
meanings.sent3: The dog wagged its tail in a meritorious manner when praised.
meanings.sent4: The meritorious tree bore the juiciest fruits in the orchard.
meanings.sent5: Her meritorious behavior at work earned her a promotion.
